com.topcoder.commons.utils

类 LoggingUtilityHelper

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.topcoder.commons.utils.LoggingUtilityHelper

  • class LoggingUtilityHelper
extends java.lang.Object
    This is a static helper class that provides log message generation functionality for LoggingWrapperUtility and Log4jUtility.

    • 方法概要

      所有方法 静态方法 具体方法 
      限定符和类型 方法和说明
      (专用程序包) static java.lang.String getExceptionMessage(java.lang.String signature, java.lang.Throwable exception)
      Retrieves the exception log message.
      (专用程序包) static java.lang.String getInputParametersMessage(java.lang.String[] paramNames, java.lang.Object[] paramValues)
      Retrieves the log message for the given input parameters.
      (专用程序包) static java.lang.String getMethodEntranceMessage(java.lang.String signature)
      Retrieves the method entrance log message.
      (专用程序包) static java.lang.String getMethodExitMessage(java.lang.String signature, java.util.Date entranceTimestamp)
      Retrieves the method exit log message.
      (专用程序包) static java.lang.String getOutputValueMessage(java.lang.Object value)
      Retrieves the log message for the given method output value.

      • 从类继承的方法 java.lang.Object

        clone, equals, finalize, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

    • 方法详细资料

      • getExceptionMessage

        static java.lang.String getExceptionMessage(java.lang.String signature,
                                            java.lang.Throwable exception)
        Retrieves the exception log message.
        参数:
        exception - the exception to be logged (assumed to be not null)
        signature - the signature that uniquely identifies the method (e.g. className#methodName)
        返回:
        the retrieved exception message

      • getInputParametersMessage

        static java.lang.String getInputParametersMessage(java.lang.String[] paramNames,
                                                  java.lang.Object[] paramValues)
        Retrieves the log message for the given input parameters. It's assumed that paramNames and paramValues contain the same number of elements.
        参数:
        paramValues - the values of input parameters (not null)
        paramNames - the names of input parameters (not null)
        返回:
        the constructed log message

      • getMethodEntranceMessage

        static java.lang.String getMethodEntranceMessage(java.lang.String signature)
        Retrieves the method entrance log message.
        参数:
        signature - the signature that uniquely identifies the method (e.g. className#methodName)
        返回:
        the constructed method entrance message

      • getMethodExitMessage

        static java.lang.String getMethodExitMessage(java.lang.String signature,
                                             java.util.Date entranceTimestamp)
        Retrieves the method exit log message.
        参数:
        entranceTimestamp - the method entrance timestamp (null if not available), is used for calculating method execution time
        signature - the signature that uniquely identifies the method (e.g. className#methodName)
        返回:
        the constructed method exit message

      • getOutputValueMessage

        static java.lang.String getOutputValueMessage(java.lang.Object value)
        Retrieves the log message for the given method output value.
        参数:
        value - the value returned by the method
        返回:
        the constructed log message
